issue.title: [CF 101] a complete restart of WoW is required to use tellmewhen 3.0.1a
issue.body:
Submitted Via

Curse Client 4.0.1.104, Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7600.0

Installed Version

TellMeWhen 3.0.1a

Description

a complete restart of WoW is required to use tellmewhen 3.0.1a. That message appears every time you load a character.

Steps to Reproduce

Install, log in.

Installed Addons

_NPCScan - _NPCScan 4.0.3.6 _NPCScan.Overlay - _NPCScan.Overlay 4.0.3.2 _NPCScan.Overlay.Broker - v1.0.3 Achievement Screenshotter - AchScreenshotter-4.0BETA Afterlife Crowd Control - Afterlife Crowd Control R3 Altoholic - Altoholic 4.0.005 Archaeology Helper - Archaeology Helper 0.91 ArkInventory - 3.02.72 Atlasloot Enhanced - v6.01.02 Auctioneer - Auctioneer Suite 5.9.4961 Bejeweled - Bejeweled v1.1b Carbonite - 4.012 CCBreaker - v0.5b Deadly Boss Mods - Deadly Boss Mods 4.70-r4833 DHUD3 - v1.5.14 DrDamage - 1.8.4_release GatherMate2 - 1.12 GatherMate2_Data - v2.9 GearScore / PlayerScore - GearScore 4.1.04 Guild Mailer - 0.3 MailGet - MailGet 1.0 Omen Threat Meter - v3.1.0 Outfitter - 5.2 PallyPower - v4.0.17 Peggle - Peggle Addon for WoW v1.02c Quartz - 3.0.4 RaidBuffStatus - v4.09 RankWatch - v1.11 RatingBuster - 1.6.2 Recount - v4.0.1e release SellJunk - 3.0 Talented - v3.0-release TellMeWhen - TellMeWhen 3.0.1a Titan Panel - 5.0.1.40000 Titan Panel [Carbonite] - v4.0.0 Titan Panel [CritLine] - TitanCritline0.6.9 Titan Panel [Gatherer] - v4.0.0 TriviaBot - v2.8.2-40000 WIM (WoW Instant Messenger) v3 - 3.5.2 X-Perl UnitFrames - 3.1.2 Release
